testcase.description: This rule evaluates whether the dimension default is associated with a given axis in the companyâ€™s extension taxonomy. Companies should not change the default member defined in the US GAAP Taxonomy for a given axis in their extension taxonomy.\n
testcase.ruleMessage: The dimension default defined for the axis in the US GAAP taxonomy should not be changed in a company extension taxonomy. The default for the ${axis_name} in the base taxonomy is ${axis_default_name}, but the default has been replaced with ${def_name}.

variation.name: Case showing no dimension default error on the IFRS taxonomy for continuing operations but shows one error for MeasurementAxis.
variation.description: The dimension default defined for the axis in the base Taxonomy should not be changed in a company extension taxonomy. The default for the ifrs-full:MeasurementAxis in the base taxonomy is ifrs-full:AggregatedMeasurementMember, but the default has been replaced with ifrs-full:AtFairValueMember in the extension taxonomy role 2428405 - Disclosure - Financial Instruments Fair value of the commodity risk management assets and liabilities by classification level (Details). This issue is addressed in Question E.16 (Updated 02/05/2013) (formerly Question 38) of the SEC Staff Interpretations and FAQs Related to Interactive Data Disclosure.

variation.name: Case showing no dimension default error on the IFRS taxonomy
variation.description: Case showing no dimension default error on the IFRS taxonomy

variation.name: Dimension default error on the IFRS taxonomy showing a fail case.
variation.description: The dimension default defined for the axis in the base Taxonomy should not be changed in a company extension taxonomy. The default for the ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis in the base taxonomy is ifrs-full:EquityMember, but the default has been replaced with QZM:EquityMemberDomain in the extension taxonomy role 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Changes in Shareholders Deficiency. This issue is addressed in Question E.16 (Updated 02/05/2013) (formerly Question 38) of the SEC Staff Interpretations and FAQs Related to Interactive Data Disclosure.\nRule version: 6.0

variation.name: Creates a fail case when a dimension default defined in the company extension is different from that defined in the US GAAP taxonomy.
variation.description: The default for the InvestmentTypeAxis (in the us-gaap taxonomy) in the base taxonomy is InvestmentTypeCategorizationMember (in the us-gaap taxonomy), but has been replaced with InvestmentDomain (in the invest taxonomy).
